cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers

Class MOAClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.common.Base
      • cs.man.ac.uk.classifiers.BaseClassifier
        • cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers.WekaClassifier
          • cs.man.ac.uk.moawrappers.MOAClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_MOAUtilities
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamAlgorithmTester

    public class MOAClassifier
extends WekaClassifier
implements I_MOAUtilities
    The class MOAClassifier defines the basic variables and methods needed to evaluate MOA based classifiers.
    Version:
    1.0, 05/03/13
    Author:
    Rob Lyon
